forward_snippets: We will consider share repurchases on an opportunistic basis.
We believe our ability to handle claims expeditiously and satisfactorily is a key to our success.
We believe our ability to handle claims expeditiously and satisfactorily is a key to our success.

We continue to enhance our talent acquisition process through a new model which will modernize our approach to talent acquisition for candidates and hiring managers, while providing an enhanced ability to proactively source and build pipelines for the best diverse talent.

While maintaining our emphasis on preservation of capital and liquidity, we expect our portfolio to become more diversified and, as a result, we may in the future expand into areas which are not part of our current investment strategy.
